meanings.definition: A small bag used for carrying toiletries, especially when traveling.
meanings.sent1: I packed my toothbrush and shampoo in the washbag for our trip.
meanings.sent2: She always keeps her makeup in the washbag to stay organized.
meanings.sent3: The washbag was so full of tiny bottles, it looked like a mini pharmacy!
meanings.sent4: Her washbag was a treasure trove of beauty essentials.
meanings.sent5: The colorful washbag stood out among her luggage.

meanings.definition: To clean or launder items in a washbag.
meanings.sent1: I will washbag my delicates to keep them safe in the machine.
meanings.sent2: She washbags her socks in a mesh bag to prevent them from getting lost.
meanings.sent3: He washbags his gym clothes separately to avoid mixing them with regular laundry.
meanings.sent4: The delicate lace was gently washbagged to preserve its intricate design.
meanings.sent5: She always remembers to washbag her swimsuit after a day at the beach.
